function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe and unsecure movement of healthcare instruments during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring of quarantine cases and slow drug supply.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using blockchain technology for tracking covid-19 infections among humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain transparency using blockchain technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data accuracy and integrity in disease surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of vaccine information modification","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and verification in donation process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Combining blockchain technology with ai and gis for public surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowdown of the global economy due to shutdown of various sectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tracking sensitive medical data on a public blockchain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for public surveillance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security breaches in blockchain technology leading to unauthorized access to patient data.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete data collection from blockchain participating nodes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blockchain technology deployment challenges and integration complexities within healthcare systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on multiple technologies such as biosensors, 3d scanning, and multi-agent systems may introduce compatibility issues and data integration challenges.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic has exposed old socioeconomic inequalities that exist in cities, threatening public health by making it difficult to enforce protective measures such as social distancing.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public transportation has been severely affected during the pandemic, leading to increased use of private vehicles as a safer alternative and potentially posing threats to achieving sustainable development.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence on the effects of urban design on covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate on the link between covid-19 prevalence and urban design characteristics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocacy for compact urban development without clear evidence on its impact on disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in high-density areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in certain phases of the epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between urban density and covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contradictory findings on the influence of urban form and design on pandemic dynamics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the relationship between population density and covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart mobility restrictions may not be effectively implemented, leading to continued spread of the virus through transportation modes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative attitudes towards public transport may persist, leading to decreased usage and increased reliance on private vehicles.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investment in cycling and pedestrian infrastructure may limit the effectiveness of active transport modes in meeting mobility demands during pandemics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased investment in suburban developments and reliance on private vehicles","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detrimental impact on well-being and health due to reduced physical activity and social isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 attributed to chinese new year, connecting flights, and rail connectivity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between frequency of air flights and high-speed rail services and number of infected people in destination cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience of bike-sharing network compared to subway system during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
